txt.en: You should collect phials of root-healing draught from within Felegoth.
Let us return to the task of mending these woods.
You should return to Radagast, who can be found at the tree nursery just outside of Felegoth.
You should defeat corrupted roots and give water to trees in need throughout Eryn Lasgalen.
Give water to trees in need ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Let us return to the task of mending these woods. The Elves of Felegoth have been preparing healing draughts - not for you or me, but for the roots of their beloved trees! Sad to say, some roots are beyond our help and must be pulled up. And yet that is the way of things. In a healthy forest, there is both growth and decay.\n\n'Will you take some phials with you and help in the healing and uprooting? I do not think it will be hard to tell which are corrupted and which can be saved.'
The roots of the forest are in need of care.
'Ah, you have returned. I gather you were successful? That is good. Good indeed!'
